headline: Stephen Colbert Rips ‘Creepy’ Jim Jordan With Innuendo-Filled Reminder Of His Past
sentences: Stephen Colbert tore into “creepy” Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) on Monday for refusing to cooperate with the House committee investigating the Jan. 6 assault on the U.S. Capitol carried about by supporters of former President Donald Trump.
